modName: Vampire Vanilla Armor Replacer - Newmiller Cuirass UNPB BBP - UNPB TBBP - CBBE - CBBE TBBP - 7BASE TBBP
summary: This is a vanilla replacer for the UNPB BBP version. All features of the original mod are still available in this replacer (i.e. craftable and wearable by character). When the mod is installed all vanilla female vampires armors in Skyrim and Dawnguard will be replaced.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Description[/size]

[size=3]This is a vanilla replacer for the UNPB BBP version. The Meshes and Textures were created by Newmiller.  All features of the original mod are still available in this replacer (i.e. craftable and wearable by character). When the mod is installed all vanilla female vampires armors in Skyrim and Dawnguard will be replaced.

It has a leveled list using all all 6 of the textures (colors) and combines the gloves and cuirass esps of the original mod into one esp. 

Levels are as follows:

Lvl 1 Iron Red cuirass, boots, gloves
Lvl 6 Steel Black cuirass, boots, gloves
Lvl 12 Copper Green cuirass, boots, gloves
Lvl 18 Copper Black cuirass, boots, gloves
Lvl 24 Gold Blue cuirass, boots, gloves,
Lvl 30 Gold Red cuirass, boots, gloves
Lvl 36 Iron Red cuirass, boots, gloves, circlet, pauldron
Lvl 42 Steel Black cuirass, boots, gloves, circlet, pauldron
Lvl 48 Copper Green cuirass, boots, gloves, circlet, pauldron
Lvl 54 Copper Black cuirass, boots, gloves, circlet, pauldron
Lvl 60 Gold Blue cuirass, boots, gloves, circlet, pauldron
Lvl 66 Gold Red cuirass, boots, gloves, circlet, pauldron

Main Files all have 50% chance wings vs no wings for all female vampires.
For those of you who want no wings or want you vampires to always have wings, I have uploaded 2 esps under optional files.
You will still need the main files then overwrite the esp with the optional version.
[/size]
[size=4]Requirements:[/size]

[size=3]UNPB BBP Body
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/]HDT High Heels System[/url]
Dawnguard expansion - Not sure if required but most likely
[/size]
[size=4]Installation:[/size]

[size=3]Download and extract to your skyrim folder. Activate the esp.[/size]

[size=4]Uninstall:[/size]

[size=3]Delete the following folders and files: 
Meshes\Newmiller\vamp 
Textures\Newmiller\vamp 
NewVampChainsArmor.esp[/size]

[size=4]Credits[/size]
[size=3]Newmiller for creating the great textures and meshes located here:[/size] [size=3] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69488/?]Vampire chain cuirass DG UNP UNPB CBBE and Bodyslide[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57540/]
[/url]Nakrulz for creating TBBP compatible meshes located here:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51000/?]Vampire Cuirass for TBBP lovers - DreamGirl UNPB CBBE and 7BASE body[/url][/size]
author: Woody1213
